About
If you are opening the app for the first time, you should have a look at settings first.
Local Emergency Number : Set whatever is appropriate in your area. etc 911 in USA, 100 for most countries.
Set Emergency Contacts : Pick two contacts who can get to you in minimal time. They will get SMS with your location when you need help.
SMS Content : Set Text content which will be sent to emergency contacts.
Help Word : Set your custom help word. Its \'help\' by default.
CheckBoxes : You can select whether to send SMS, Record Audio, or Send location with SMS. These Settings were put there for debug purposes. We suggest you keep them all checked.
Service Start/Stop : A Service always listens to your voice. Even when the screen is locked. You can turn it off when you KNOW you are safe and DON\'T NEED HELP.
NEVER FORGET to press \'save\' button after you change anything in settings.
